jd.title: Jaekka's Devoted
jd.confirmationMessage: How nice it is to see someone so fitting to Jaekka's Devoted! Truly selfless, they want to care for the world and those around them, and to find out more about it, following Novask the Scribe for his great wisdom and knowledge.

mv.title: Mystic Vanguard
mv.confirmationMessage: Well, you seem to know exactly what you want from life - A quality belonging to those in the Mystic Vanguard, who strive for self-improvement and fight against injustice. They greatly admire Thua, the Fundament, for her willpower and ambition.

sof.title: Stewards Of Fate
sof.confirmationMessage: Welcome, young one! I'm sure the Stewards of Fate are pleased to have you among their forces. They strive to create order from chaos, and respect Iganash as the King. Go well and with strength, my friend.

gbc.title: God Beast's Congregation
gbc.confirmationMessage: Hm... Yes. I think you would be an excellent fit for the God Beast's Congregation. Like Sulhanna the Artist, they value community, beauty, and the small pleasures in life.

zero.text: Hello, I'm The Mediator. I'm here to guide you through the world of Chroma: Bloom and Blight. Would you like to take the faction quiz? After taking it you'll join one of the four factions. To answer please reply with the number corresponding to the answer you choose for each question.

answers.text: Yes, I would like to take the quiz now.
No, thanks. Maybe later.
answers.reply: You may take the faction quiz any time you want, simply use the command !quiz.

one.text: An enormous earthquake struck the small town you’re currently residing in, and the people of the town need your aid. What role will you assume to help the townspeople?

answers.text: I'll prioritize setting up shelters for the injured. Night is coming and they need to be kept safe and warm.
I'll try and help with the care of the injured, setting bones and cleaning wounds.
I'll make sure the town is in order - That everyone has a place to sleep, enough food to eat, and are reunited with their loved ones.
I'll be part of the rescue mission - Venturing into the rubble to pull out survivors.

two.text: You find a weathered chest hidden in the shadows of a great cave. You carefully lift the lid, and inscribed within, you read “Pick one of greatest importance, that you may better your world”. Which artifact will you choose?

answers.text: A cape that when worn, makes you feel warm, energised, calm and comfortable, wherever you are, whatever you're doing.
A candle that when lit, seems to quiet the mind and tame the thoughts of the onlooker.
An ornate bronze chestpiece that repels the effects of spells or magic cast on the wearer.
A small black dragon scale on a leather cord that amplifies willpower and makes you feel as though you could take on any challenge thrown at you.

three.text: What would you hate to be called the most?

answers.text: Irresponsible.
Ignorant.
Spineless.
Irritating.

four.text: You've just found out that a good friend of yours has been smuggling forbidden Cardinal Cap mushrooms into Drachoria. What is your next step?

answers.text: Tell your friend that you're worried about what might happen if they get caught. The law could become involved and that wouldn't be pretty.
Talk to your friend, and ask them to stop. The mushrooms can be deadly, and your friend might end up responsible for hurting someone.
Ask them how you can get in on the business - extra cash never hurt.
You've always wanted to try these mushrooms, as they have mind-expanding properties. Ask them how much a mushroom costs.

five.text: You enter a garden bordering Sulhanna's Orchard, where all sorts of strange and wonderful flowers bloom. Which catches your eye first?

answers.text: A bed of tiny red flowers that glow like ashes, with an intoxicating scent that makes you feel powerful and lively.
A sweet-smelling bushel that is groaning under the weight of its bright blue berries, inviting you to take a handful and eat your fill.
A bloomless vine that has what appears to be inscribed parchment and small silver keys hanging from it in the place of leaves.
A fern growing in a fractal pattern, its fronds sprouting from the soil at perfect angles.

six.text: Four kittens are playing in a field, seemingly motherless but unharmed. You decide to take them in. You give three away to loving homes, and keep one. Which one do you keep?

answers.text: The tiny grey one that wants nothing more than to play and bat shiny things around the floor.
The larger tabby that struts around like it owns the place - and you suppose it does now.
The small cream-colored loner that would do just about anything for a piece of chicken.
The sleek jet black one that spends its time playing with its siblings and washing them.

seven.text: You wake in a cold sweat from your worst nightmare - What happened?

answers.text: You had severely injured someone you love in an accident. The guilt weighed on your chest until you felt like you could barely breathe.
You were sat in an armchair, at a very old age, sick and exhausted, and you realised you had completely wasted your life - And you were far too old and weak to change anything.
None of your friends or family would acknowledge your existence, it was like you weren't even there, and it was all your fault.
You found yourself in a great examination hall, and you knew it was the most important exam you'd ever take. You read the first page, only to realise were completely and utterly unprepared.

eigth.text: It's your birthday in a few days. What would be your ideal day?

answers.text: A big surprise party put on by your friends and loved ones, with plenty of cake, presents and food.
Celebrating birthdays isn't really your thing. It's just another day.
A quiet day with your family at a museum or park, celebrating another year of life.
A day to yourself, so you can do exactly what you want to do without needing to think about anyone else.

nine.text: You have the chance to learn the ways of magic. What do you most want to use them for?

answers.text: To lead a fulfilling life for myself, and better the lives of the people in my community.
To see the ways of the world more clearly, and to be able to use this to help those who need it most.
To fix the chaos in the world, and stop those who would cause destruction and evil.
To attain everlasting life.

ten.text: You stumble upon a stranger limping down a darkened alleyway. You call out, and as he turns to look at you, his eyes reflect the little light around him, and you feel uneasy. What do you do next?

answers.text: Ask him if he's in need of help, be it medical or otherwise.
answers.reply: Thank you for answering my questions, you have joined your faction.

answers.text: Put your hand on your weapon, as he might be dangerous.
answers.reply: Thank you for answering my questions, you have joined your faction.

answers.text: Try and figure out if he's a direct threat to you. If he isn't, you'll help him.
answers.reply: Thank you for answering my questions, you have joined your faction.

answers.text: Call to the friends you're with, and ask them to come over and help.
answers.reply: Thank you for answering my questions, you have joined your faction.
